tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Physcian,managing acute medical conditions, Pneumonia,Body Ache,Fever Treatment,
review:
I have had the pleasure of receiving medical care for my family from Dr. Pankaj Singhai at Manipal Hospital, Old Airport Road, for the last ~10 years. 

My mother is a RA (rheumatoid arthritis) patient. She has been taking treatment for RA at Manipal Hospital, Old Airport Road, Bangalore, since 2008.

When her health deteriorated, with multiple problems in 2014, my father approached Dr. Pankaj Singhai in 2014. Considering her chronic condition, he had prescribed a low dosage and administered commensurate treatment and gradually brought her to a normal level and set her health right, and saved her life. Since then she is under the treatment of Dr. Pankaj Singhai and he has been treating her with an appropriate dosage. On account of his treatment, my mother is active today. 

The holy proverb “Doctor is next to God” appropriately applies to him. 

I and my father have advised our relatives, friends, and associated colleagues to approach Dr. Pankaj Singhai for better treatment. 

I and our family are indebted to the doctor for the exemplary medical care he has given to my mother.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I’ve been consulting Dr. Pankaj since 7 years now and trust me I’ve never looked back to any other GP since then. Whenever I’ve a condition where I’m unwell mostly due to fever and gastric or any other ailment then I run to him and trust me when I walk out from chamber I’m calm, cool and composed. It’s just not about his accurate analysis and medication, it is also about the confidence he puts in my head to make sure I’m getting the right treatment. Also he tells a lot about managing small episodes of gastric and fever at home by taking right medicines and not to run hospital each and every time which is highly recommended. A charming and friendly person who doesn’t recommend unnecessary tests and medicines but a lot of trust to make sure you’ll be treated right . Took a long time to finally write a valid review but longer the better . I highly recommend him and make sure your appointments are booked well in advance to avoid longer waiting period at Manipal .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor was very rude and in an extreme hurry. This was a follow-up visit from another doctor and unfortunately we were assigned this doctor as the first one was unavailable. ****** **** ** ******* ** ********** *** ******** ** *** ****** **** ******** He just said it's all due to old age and viral fever without even looking at the reports. He kept showing us out within 2 minutes of entering. Wastage of time and money.
Dr Pankaj is a gem of a doctor. He has been treating me for many years and keep a tab after my yearly health checkup.

** ********* ****** ****** *******.I was lucky to have visited him for my father's diabetes.Incidently,he also detected that my father had cardiac problem and luckily,we could take steps for preventing further damage.The most amazing thing about Dr Pankaj is his good nature and friendly attitude.He makes the patient at ease and explains all details to patient and relatives.I always feel we as a family are in safe hands.Thankyou doctor.God bless you.

I had a visit to Manipal Hospital for my general health check up. It took almost 40 minutes to get my session. Other than that, everything else was fine. The consultation was absolutely satisfactory. I am happy with Dr. Pankaj Singhai. I will recommend him with pleasure.

I had a visit to Manipal Hospital for my general health check up. It took almost 40 minutes to get my session. Other than that, everything else was fine. The consultation was absolutely satisfactory. I am happy with Dr. Pankaj Singhai. I will recommend him with pleasure.

For the first time, I consulted him at Manipal Hospital. During then, he was into some emergency. So I had to wait for more than 45 minutes to get my consultation. He was a nice person, who explained to me all about the diagnosis very well. There was no test suggestion in particular. *** ********* *** ********* *** the results are highly satisfying.

With Dr. Pankaj, it was my second time consultation. He was quite approachable and gave a detailed analysis of the condition. The treatment was satisfactory. But the consultation was behind time. In spite of a prior appointment, it took about 30 minutes to consult the doctor. Still, the overall experience was good and I recommend the doctor.

One of my family members was suffering from severe stomach pain from two weeks, along with a high fever. We visited this doctor seeking emergency advice. His approach was nice and the consultation seemed to satisfy at the moment. He suspected urinary tract infection and prescribed the medications. **** ** *** *** ****** *** ******* we consulted another Urologist *** ** *** **** ********* **** *** *** ********* **** ******* ** *** ****** ***** ** *** ** ***** ********** ** ** *** ********* ******** *** ********* ******** **** ******** ** ***** ** ** *** **** *** ********* ** ***** **** ***** ***** ** * ****** ** *****

Very good doctor I like is sir is very friendly my problem is Solved manipal hospital is so good
Thank you so much

Dr Pankaj patiently listened to the problems and throughly checked all reports. Then he did physical examination and explained the mode of treatment. He didnt suggest any unnecessary medication or tests. Really nice experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: very friendly doctor. Listen to the patient's problem and explain clearly about diseases. He is very much recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Explanation of health issue was great. Hoping to get better soon . Next visit would be next week. Fingers crossed

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We generally visit him for any regular check up like fever, fatigue, etc. I recommend him to all my friends family and colleagues as he is really good and give you right advice and treatment.

On October 2019,i visited at manipal hospital at hal airport road regarding anxiety, headache...that time I am thinking that something serious is happened... But after consult with pankaj sir its all normal... Sir listen everything very carefully... Give some test...very less medicine.. Thats it... Now My headache totally gone... So finally thank u very much sir be a kind hearted person....

I just took one consultation, followed by a review session. In which the waiting time was quite a bit longer than usual. When the doctor came and started the session, I had already spent 45 minutes waiting. But the consultation was satisfactory. He was very descriptive about the health issues and the suggested treatment was absolutely good. I am happy with the results.

I just went there for a normal cough issue. He was very nice in approach. Based on the symptoms, he suggested a few tablets. ** ****** ****** **** **** quick results. The consultation itself was immediately scheduled. I actually had an appointment through Practo. So I didn't have to wait much. It was overall a very good experience.

It was one of my general visit to this doctor and the treatment was fine. He didn't really insist on taking any medical tests. The session was satisfying and I am happy about the outcome as well. But the waiting period was too long. It took almost one and a half hours to consult the doctor. I actually had a prior appointment and was on time too. But still, it took too long as there was a long queue ahead of me.

The doctor is very experienced and has a good understanding of general medicine. However, the doctor needs to improve on empathy for the patient who comes for consultation. 

Wait time is too much despite booking appointment

review: Dr. Pankaj Singhai is a friendly & very  cool. I am very  happy on conversations with the  Doctor & satisfactory treatment also.
I am very much thankful to Dr. Pankaj Singhai. I am fully satisfied for his treatment. Under his treatment, my mother has  gradually improved  for her  pro long illness.
